text: She's back in the No. 1 spot on the Billboard 200 with her new album Rainbow. And while Kesha wasn't nominated for any awards at the MTV Video Music Awards, she was glowing in a rosey ruffled dress on Sunday at The Forum in Inglewood, California. The 30 - year - old singer donned a bevy of soft blush tulle to pose for pictures ahead of introducing rapper Logic â€™ s performance of the song'1 - 800 - 273 - 8255 ', named for the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline phone number.
